body: Why the loli tag?  Mei Fon's just flat as heck, Mamori's older than Mirei, and Mirei . . . is not a loli.  I really wish they'd do sequel for the anime.  It was AMAZING, great action, characters, and top-notch service.
I wish there was more stuff for this show. I genuinely liked it, and it has so much potential for material, canon or not. Guess we'll just have to take what we can get.
I loved that show, and this is so hot
Pfft!! That freak-out at the end... LOL!!
it is a shame there is so few about this anime, there is a lot that you can work with at least with yuri
